== Shoranur (M) (803273) ==

Shoranur (M) is a town in the [[Ottappalam]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 32.28 sq. km. and harbouring 10420 households with total population of 43533 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 47 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 329 km. Male population is 20757 and female population is 22776. Scheduled Caste population is 7423 and Scheduled Tribes population is 88. Census Location Code of the town is 803273<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Palakkad (m) at a distance of 47 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Coimbatore(m corp. )  at a distance of 95 km. Railway station is at Shoranur at a distance of 0 km.
